column1: in memory of amy jo walters| send card. amy jo walters. october 24
column6: passed away after a courageous battle with cancer on june 10
column7: 2015 at the m. s. hershey medical center. she was preceded in death by her husband
column11: she was the daughter of cheryl a. hostetter weidman of annville and the late davilla d. weidman. amy jo enjoyed camping
column14: and was also a gamer. surviving in addition to her mother
column15: she is survived by her sister rose lawer
column18: uncle earl hostetter and uncle russell hostetter
column19: and her nephew nicklaus mc. connell. she is also survived by several aunts
column21: and cousins. a viewing will be held on monday june 15
column22: 2015 from 6pm 8pm at the kreamer funeral home and crematory inc.
column24: annville. interment will be private and at the convenience of the family.
